```{r}
#| echo: false
library(webexercises)
```

```{r}
#| class: webex-box
#| echo: false
#| results: asis 
question <- "What is a common memory issue when working with large datasets in R?"
question_choices <- c(
    answer = "Exhausting available memory",
    "Slow data loading",
    "Overfitting",
    "Data corruption"
)
cat(question, longmcq(sample(question_choices)))
```
